channel.title: Explosions not affecting entities correctly
channel.description: A good example is the sleeping 3 houndeye pack in Blast Pit. In 2012 release, a grenade would blast them away from the spots they were lying at. Now, they are gibbed, but remain exactly in the same place. I also noticed this with bullsquids - they remain on the spot, but gibbed. This almost makes the gibbing pointless because they form a full body on the floor instead of bursting in different directions.

item.title: Explosions not affecting entities correctly
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
A good example is the sleeping 3 houndeye pack in Blast Pit. In 2012 release, a grenade would blast them away from the spots they were lying at. Now, they are gibbed, but remain exactly in the same place. I also noticed this with bullsquids - they remain on the spot, but gibbed. This almost makes the gibbing pointless because they form a full body on the floor instead of bursting in different directions.
